tool_description: Processes credit applications by validating application data, checking completeness, and organizing information for assessment workflow.

application_id.description: Unique identifier for the credit application

error_messages: Invalid application_id: Application ID cannot be empty and must be unique.
Invalid applicant_name: Applicant name cannot be empty.
Invalid business_type: Must be one of [Corporation, LLC, Partnership, Sole_Proprietorship, Non_Profit].
Invalid requested_credit_amount: Must be a positive number greater than zero.
Invalid application_date: Must be in valid date-time format and not in the future.
usage: Provide application_id, applicant_name, business_type, requested_credit_amount, and application_date. The tool validates and processes the application for further assessment steps.

next_steps.description: Required next steps in the process

processing_date.description: Date when application was processed in date-time format
